description:
Serge is originally from Russia. He's been in the States for two years now. He's still perfecting his English, but the excitement of the new and unexplored experiences he is having is quite evident on his face.
"I moved from Russia to America…two years ago."
"Why did you come here?" I asked.
"Because I like the nature in America. I like ocean so much and ocean is everything for me. I like surfing. I like swimming."
He replied with an accent and a huge smile.
There was basically nothing that he did not like. Compared to his life in Russia, every day in America is an adventure for him. That sense of excitement is understandable considering he grew up on a farm helping taking care of animals and shoveling snow.
I was curious as to why he was so open and excited about slapping his uncut cock out and showing off his amazing body for everyone to see.
"Was this on your list of things to do? Do porn?"
"I do porn because I want have experience everywhere. I used to work like a dishwasher. Like a cook. Like a dancer... I want to get as much experience as I can!"
Well, he experienced this 100% and did not leave without making an impression. He has one of the most explosive, far-reaching cum shots I have ever seen! His load almost landed on the camera!
title: Serge
